data.message: More people have to get registered. My wife saved 4 with her Donation. She was only 44 and had a brain bleed that took her life, not until she saved others.

replies.message: Our condolences for your loss, Jody. By giving others a second chance, her kindness lives on. We appreciate you sharing this. -Kevin

That is really sad. So sorry for your loss. I think facebook should allow for those in need of organ transplants to petition for funding, also. Donating is great but people need more than just organs.

So Sorry  for your loss. May you and your family find comfort in knowing that your wife gave four others an enriched life.  When my time comes I hope I can help others.  I AM HAPPY TO BE WILLING TO BE AN ORGAN DONOR.

I have big problem with #facebook_ads  and there is no support from Facebookook and they are not trying to help me put ads again in the time i send them many emails that Im ready for anything required by facebook system to get my ads working ,,, I feel disappointed with facebook ads support
